page.title: 14LEISURE IN BURGHILL
page.content: The main leisure groups in the Burghill and Tillington area are the Cricket Club, Womens Institute and the Youth Club. In addition there is an Over 60's Club an under 14's football and Scout/Guide groups. The cricket club have a friendly league team and an under 13's team.We have junior training on Wednesdays. There are about twenty members. The Womens Institute have a monthly meeting. The topics that they cover range from spinning to Yoga. Yoga was so popular that they now have a weekly class. The Youth Club is held in the Simpson Hall on a Friday. They do lots of activities such as snooker and table tennis. They have competitions and a monthly disco. The Youth Club has about twenty members. .,
